17.ara-name: كتاب الحدود عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umar bin Al-Khattab said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) stoned, Abu Bakr stoned, and I stoned. If I didn't dislike that I add to the Book of Allah. I would have written it in the Mushaf, for I fear that there will come a people and they will not find it in the Book of Allah, so they will disbelieve in it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَحْقِيقِ الرَّجْمِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Confirming Stoning
